settings.title: Grow Your Customer Base with Non-Toxic Options Everyone Wants
settings.text: Minimum Risk 25(b) insecticides at a fraction of the cost.

settings.title: The Most Effective Non-Toxic Option for Professionals
settings.text: Lawn and home treatments, backed by science powered by nature.

Now more than ever, customers are looking for non-toxic pest control solutions. Already offer non-toxic? Our pesticides contain higher concentrations, which means lower cost per treatment and fewer callbacks. Plus, our bug sprays are broad spectrum, so you can cut costs by eliminating the need for redundant products.

settings.title: Fast Turnaround
settings.text: Our wholesalers enjoy hassle-free ordering, and famously quick turnaround times and shipping.

settings.title: Family & Pet-Safe
settings.text: Cedarcide gets the job done without exposing your customers, their pets, or your employees to harmful chemicals.

settings.title: Made in the USA
settings.text: American owned and operated, Cedarcide has been in business for over 25 years.

settings.title: Bulk Discounts
settings.text: For professionals in need of large orders, we offer customized wholesale pricing to save you more.

settings.contact_text:
You’re researching online because what you’re using isn’t cutting it. Contact us to learn why Cedarcide could be a game changer for your business and your customers.

For quote pricing and terms, leave your details below or contact our team at wholesale@cedarcide.com. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
